title: Observability-first platform
summary: Standardize logs, metrics, traces, and correlation so every integration is diagnosable and supportable.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Integration platforms become opaque without consistent telemetry; incidents become guesswork.
whenToUse: You run distributed services and messaging
whenNotToUse: You can tolerate limited visibility and manual debugging

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Mandate correlation IDs and standard dashboards for every integration from day one.

realWorldExample.approach: Standardized correlation and dashboards across integrations.
realWorldExample.outcome: Faster incident resolution and better platform trust.
